means: 撒尔沙植物，由撒尔沙根中提炼的药

word_mean: 菝葜：菝葜属(Smilax aristolochiaefolia)(百合科)及其相关种的干燥根茎，可用作饮料的调味剂，也用以治疗牛皮癣，其中含有菝葜皂甙元，为一种用做制造孕烷系列化合物的前体

sentence.Network_en: I had never had anything stronger than sarsaparilla before.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从来没有喝过比沙士汽水更厉害的饮料.

sentence.Network_en: European maritime sedge naturalized along Atlantic coast of United States; rootstock has properties of sarsaparilla.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种欧洲的海岸苔草,沿美国大西洋海岸归化; 具有菝葜性能的根茎.

sentence.Network_en: It's the American equivalent of ginger beer, but flavoured with sassafras and sarsaparilla roots.
sentence.Network_cn: 根酒是美国的姜汁啤酒, 不过加上了檫树根和菝葜根.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Spanish zarzaparilla, from zarza 'bramble' + a diminutive of parra 'vine'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various prickly climbing plants of the tropical American genus Smilax having aromatic roots and heart-shaped leaves
2. carbonated drink flavored with an extract from sarsaparilla root or with birch oil and sassafras
